name: Oracle GI Release Update 19.14.0.0.220118 + Recommended Patches for 19.14 19.14.0.0 220118 x64 [2022, Multi + RUS]
author: p4vwd7
description:
Oracle GI Release Update 19.14.0.0.220118 + Recommended Patches for 19.14Год/Дата Выпуска: 2022
Версия: 19.14.0.0 Build 220118
Разработчик: Oracle Corporation
Сайт разработчика: https://www.oracle.com/databaseРазрядность: 64bit
Язык интерфейса: Мультиязычный (русский присутствует)
Таблэтка: не требуется
Системные требования:
Minimum RAM: At least 1 GB RAM for Oracle Database installations. 2 GB RAM recommended.
At least 8 GB RAM for Oracle Grid Infrastructure installations.
OS: Linux x86-64
Описание:
Patch 33509923 - GI Release Update 19.14.0.0.220118
Patch 33561310 - Oracle JavaVM Component Release Update 19.14.0.0.220118
Patch 6880880 - OPatch 12.2.0.1.29

Oracle Database 19c Important Recommended One-off Patches (Doc ID 555.1)
Recommended Patches for 19.14 DB Home:
Patch 33225584 - Instance Slow or Hung With High Shared Pool Latch Contention With Waits/Sleeps in kghfrunp() and Possible 'ORA-32701: Possible hangs up to hang ID= detected'
Patch 33988339 - Performance Issue After Single Flash Disk Went Into Confinement
Patch 33872045 - Recommended OCW Merge for 19.14
Patch 29524043 - CDB: cleanup files after any failure in pdb clone before plugging in system tablespace
Patch 29780459 - High Waits On "latch :ges resource hash list" After Upgrading to 18c or Above
Patch 33550827 - Switchover/Failover Can Hang With ORA-1093 and Instance Terminated
Patch 33457235 - Instance Crash with ORA-07445 [kcbs_free_granule_sim_buffers] and Other Internal Errors when NUMA is Enabled
Patch 32580378 - Commit after insert into a hash partitioned table may fail with ORA-00600 [ktsplstchg-h] if there is a concurrent DDL/DML workload on multiple PDBs
Patch 33121934 - Library cache lock / load lock / mutex x during connection storm due to update user$
Patch 29213893 - DBMS_STATS Failing With Error Ora-1422 When Gathering Stats for User$ Table
Patch 30978304 - ORA-20000 During Data Pump Import While Importing StatisticsRecommended Patches for 19.14 GI Home
Patch 33872045 - Recommended OCW Merge for 19.14
Patch 33497706 - ACFS: ADVMK-0022: An internal error occurred - Issue with drl segment 3 forcing full resilvering.
Patch 33733953 - Database Service Fails to Start With "CRS-5037: Database does not have the required fix for bug '31143870'" AFTER Grid Infrastructure Patching or Upgrade to 19.14 RU


Дополнительные патчи которые могут быть полезными
Patch 31324507: INSTANCE CRASHED AFTER SEVERAL PROCESS HANG DUE TO LATCH: CACHE BUFFERS CHAINS
Patch 33661080: Merge 29780459 & 33121934
Patch 33734862: Merge 31324507 & 33457235
